alert.note: Alert for Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:28AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sheridan and southwestern Graham Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 127 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Menlo, or 9 miles north of Grinnell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Sheridan and southwestern Graham Counties, including the following locations... Angelus, Saint Peter and Tasco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
